surface pressure, turn to hPa (; unit of PSFC in WRF is Pa)   pres        =   wrf_user_getvar(a1,"pressure",-1)                     ; air pressure  hPa (time,level,lat,lon)   temp        =   wrf_user_getvar(a1,"tk",-1)                           ; m s-1   ; printVarSummary(psfc)                                                 ; (time,lat,lon)   ; printVarSummary(pres)                                                 ; (time,level,lat,lon)   ; printVarSummary(temp)                                                 ; (time,level,lat,lon)   ; printVarSummary(rh)                                                   ; (time,level,lat,lon)   ; printVarSummary(ua)                                                   ; (time,level,lat,lon)   ; printVarSummary(va)                                                   ; (time,level,lat,lon)    psfc1       =   dim_avg_n_Wrap(psfc,0)    pres1       =   dim_avg_n_Wrap(pres,0)                                  temp1       =   dim_avg_n_Wrap(temp,0)   rh1         =   dim_avg_n_Wrap(rh,0)   ua1         =   dim_avg_n_Wrap(ua,0)   va1         =   dim_avg_n_Wrap(va,0)                                                      ;[website]  shum        =   mixhum_ptrh(pres1,temp1,rh1,2)    ;units: (hPA,K,%,kg/kg);calculate the specific humidity(2),(1)means mixing ratio   printVarSummary(shum)   uq          =   ua1 * shum                        ;vapor flux   vq          =   va1 * shum    copy_VarCoords(psfc(0,:,:), psfc1)   copy_VarCoords(ua(0,:,:,:), uq)   copy_VarCoords(va(0,:,:,:), vq)   copy_VarCoords(pres(0,:,:,:), pres1)  ;;--vertical integrated moisture flux   ptop        =   100                                                                   ;
